title: Carlos Alcaraz and His Coach Say Goodbye
summary: Carlos Alcaraz is a top tennis player who won big tournaments like the French Open and US Open. He surprised everyone by stopping work with his coach, Juan Carlos Ferrero, after seven years. They started when Alcaraz was 15, and Ferrero helped him become a champion. Alcaraz says they are still friends and made the decision together. He is thankful for all he learned. Now, Alcaraz is getting ready for the Australian Open, where he wants to win another big title. Other players think it's strange because they were doing so well together.
